articles.title: How Leica is working with Xiaomi to bring its iconic camera tech to smartphones - The Indian Express
articles.description: Leica, known for its high-end cameras, emphasizes maintaining quality and won't compromise for budget smartphones. Partnering with Xiaomi, they aim to bring the "Leica look" to phone cameras.
